name: Anno 1800: The Passage
storyline:
Take your Anno 1800 experience to the next level with the new arctic session: The Passage.
- Construct arctic outposts and a fleet of airships to speed up the trade across all sessions of your empire
- Enjoy the new Explorer and Technician residential tiers
- Master new production chains and arctic trade goods
- Use the new heating system to ensure your residents survive the brutal cold of the Passage
summary:
The 3rd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 1 Pass.

Take to the skies with your airships and use new production chains and goods to create an arctic outpost that will withstand the cold of the Passage.
